# GitHub Templates

This directory contains GitHub-specific templates and workflows for the Memorabilia project.

## ğŸ“„ Files

### PULL_REQUEST_TEMPLATE.md
Automatically populates when creating a Pull Request on GitHub.

**Features:**
- Task-specific acceptance criteria
- Testing checklist
- Deliverables tracking
- Pre-merge verification

**Usage:**
When you create a PR on GitHub, this template will automatically appear in the description field. Fill it out completely before requesting review.

## ğŸ”— Related Documentation

- [GIT_WORKFLOW.md](../GIT_WORKFLOW.md) - Complete Git workflow guide
- [DEVELOPMENT_TASKS.md](../DEVELOPMENT_TASKS.md) - All development tasks

## ğŸ“ How to Use

1. Create a feature branch: `feature/<yourName>-<taskShortName>`
2. Make your changes and commit
3. Push to GitHub
4. Create Pull Request
5. Template auto-populates
6. Fill out all sections
7. Request review

## âœ… PR Checklist

Before submitting a PR:
- [ ] All acceptance criteria checked
- [ ] Screenshots/logs attached
- [ ] Tests passing
- [ ] Documentation updated
- [ ] Rebased on latest `main`
